# comboBoxWillPopUp(_:)

**Instance Method**

Informs the delegate that the pop-up list is about to be displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func comboBoxWillPopUp(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSComboBox/willPopUpNotification].

## Manipulating the selection

- **comboBoxSelectionDidChange(_:)**: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list selection has finished changing.
- **comboBoxSelectionIsChanging(_:)**: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list selection is changing.
- **comboBoxWillDismiss(_:)**: Informs the delegate that the pop-up list is about to be dismissed.
